thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel
thread.title_full: Nice hotel - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BMinDRW
title: Nice hotel
text:
Well located. Good staff. Big rooms (especially for NYC).
Generally the standard you would expect from a big brand hotel in a big city. Would stay here again because I like the location and the variety of food in the immediate vicinity.
Only real downside is that the rooms (even from the executive floors - 14 and 15) were a little uninspiring. But at the price... this is a fantastic option.
